Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Fischer Egger Schnell at a charity gala in Vienna. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Fischer Egger Schnell is a seasoned professional with over 43 years of experience.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Fischer Egger Schnell is currently widowed. He has 2 kids called Ilse and Victoria.
Education Background:
Fischer obtained his secondary school diploma from Gymnasium Wasagasse in 1978.
Fischer completed his university education at Vienna University of Technology in 1981.
Occupation History:
Fischer Egger Schnell is a 66 year old and comes from Austria.
Fischer Egger Schnell's first role was as a Aerospace Engineer at AMSC Austria, where he worked diligently from 1982 to 1987 to establish a strong reputation.
He then transitioned to Diamond Aircraft Industries as a Program Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1987 till retirement.
Wealth Summary:
